## Introduction

-   Will be demoing some EK80 functionality related to ADCP data and bottom detection that we might may use of.

-   Intended to show a simple Korona workflow that was established a while ago and has perhaps been underutilized.

## ADCP output dialog

![](images/adcp-output-dialog.png){fig-alt="ADCP output dialog" fig-align="center"}

-   For converting raw to netCDF with new option of just converting the adcp-part of the raw-file.

## XYZ

![](images/xyz.png){fig-alt="xyz" fig-align="center"}

-   Generate ascii-output file, three column layout, Greenland 'always' processes to xyx on Tarajoq, since their waters are uncharted to a considerable extent.

## Bottom and all

![](images/bot-and-all.png){fig-alt="Bottom and all" fig-align="center"}

-   Here the EK80 is set-up to record three types of outputs. Some care needed in directing them to correct places.
